phrases: That took longer than expected.
I-I am very sorry.
You are a weak-willed, inept brat whose only saving grace is swordsmanship,
but I can turn you into a Rank 1 student who will go down in Seidoukan history.
Only my foolproof planning can make that possible.
Yes, Uncle, I understand...
Do not you ever forget that!
That is, if you want your dreams to come true!
Yes, I understand.
I understand, Uncle.
The True Face of the Girl
Uh...
So you are mad at me after all?
After all, did you say?
So something does ring a bell, eh?
Well, dueling that kid without your approval, maybe?
About that, it does not really matter.
Even if he is her uncle, he should not be allowed to use another person as a tool.
Julis...
In fact, if you would turned a blind eye to what that man Kouichiro was doing,
I would have been disappointed in you.
If I would seen what you saw, I would have done the same thing.
Thanks.
That really makes me happy.
It is not anything you need to thank me for!
All I meant was...
Uh...
Anyway!
That is not what I am angry about!
Well, then...
It is because you lost.
But hey...
You do not have to tell me!
This is just me being irrational and selfish.
Still, even so...
I thought that if anyone had a chance, it would be you!
But in this case, I guess we should probably give Kirin Toudou props.
After all, look how powerful she is at just thirteen!
Th-Thirteen?
She sure does not look her age...
You certainly seem to have a keen interest in her.
Oh, never mind.
At Seidoukan, there are three people that I simply cannot defeat at my current level...
You and Claudia...
Not Claudia, either?
She may not look it, but she is Rank 2 at our school.
She is, huh?
Her alias is the Master of a Thousand Eyes.
She wields the Ogre Lux, Pan-Dora, which has the ability to see the future.
See the future?
You mean precognition?
Rumor has it that she can see up to tens of seconds into the future.
Claudia remains undefeated since she started here.
In that regard alone, Kirin Toudou is no different,
but there is one definitive thing that sets her apart.
It is the fact that Toudou is neither an Ogre Lux wielder nor a Strega.
Even if it is only been for three months,
to have successfully defended her No. 1 ranking with only a Japanese sword is extraordinary.
Still, we are going to have to rethink our battle strategy for the Phoenix Festa.
Now that your abilities are no longer a secret, we will have to scrap our current game plan.
Sorry.
But only after you acquire a new school emblem.
Uh, what is this place?
Surprised, much?
This is the student council's resting room, you know.
Uh, I was told to get my new school emblem here...
Yes, so I have been told.
You came to get this, right?
Thanks!
By the way, Claudia.
Where exactly did you take this out from?
That is my secret.
Still, I have to say I never thought that you would duel Ms. Toudou.
Well, one thing led to another, you know.
With Mr. Kouichiro Toudou, you mean?
You know him?
Yes, since he is quite a troublemaker.
He is an employee of Seidoukan Academy's parent company,
GALAXY ORGANIZATIONAL CHART INTEGRATED ENTERPRISE FOUNDATION SEIDOUKAN ACADEMY
Galaxy, of the Integrated Enterprise Foundation.
As he is basically in charge of scouting operations for our school, he wields considerable clout.
You mean he is one of the top brass?
I suppose executive candidate would be accurate?
Of course, Mr. Toudou seems more than eager to claim a spot on the executive board.
Towards that end, he appears to be wringing everything he can out of his own niece.
So just as I thought, she is being forced to duel by that guy?
I do not know about that.
She does seem to have her own agenda.
However, securing an executive position will not be easy for Mr. Toudou.
If you have an irrational sense of self-interest,
you will never advance at the Integrated Enterprise Foundation.
Only those who have undergone numerous levels of the psychological adjustment program,
and had their personal desires completely eradicated are suited for the position.
You seem to know a lot about it.
Yes, because my mother is one of them.
So Ayato, what are you planning to do about Ms. Toudou?
Kirin Toudou?
Yo, Amagiri, someone is here to see you!
Amagiri!
Drawing room in use
Um, what can I do for you?
Um, thank you very much!
Huh?
Uh...
Amagiri, even though I was a stranger to you,
you protected me from my uncle!
And, uh, although things ended up the way they did...
it really made me happy!
Do not mention it.
As it turned out, I was not able to help you, anyway.
That is not true...
Hard to believe she is so incredibly powerful.
Amagiri.
You sure are zealous about gathering info, Yabuki.
Guess so!
Ms. Toudou, you are not nervous, are you?
Huh?
Oh, yes!
I am so sorry!
I have never walked this way with a man who was not a relative.
Dad was my father was so strict, you see.
I see.
I hear that Toudou-style training is strict, too.
You know about my family's swordsmanship style?
Well, sure.
I am not a budding swordsman for nothing.
Of course I have heard of the Toudou-style and its Like folding a crane philosophy.
Amagiri, yours is one of the ancient styles, is not it?
I am impressed you know that.
Because I noticed that you would sometimes drop down in your stance during our duel the other day.
Whenever you made a move from a defensive position, you would slide your feet,
and the point of your sword was held quite high when you aimed for my eyes.
This is also characteristic of the ancient styles.
If only I would gotten to cross swords with you, I could have learned more.
I am sorry.
I could not help myself.
You are really into kenjutsu, huh, Ms. Toudou?
Yes!
Because I have no other talent besides kenjutsu.
That cannot be true...
No, it is true.
I am a klutz, and a coward.
But even so, as long as I am holding a sword I can be useful to someone else.
That is why I enjoy it, and I really love it.
Is that right?
I cannot afford to lose, either.
Listen, Ms. Toudou...
Yes?
What are you fighting for?
To save my father, that is why.
Is that why you are doing as your uncle tells you?
My uncle has shown me the most appropriate and quickest path to achieve my dream.
I am very grateful to him.
Even if you are being used to further his career?
I am being shown how to realize my dream,
and he is going to be compensated for that.
Therefore, this is a fair transaction.
It sure did not seem that way to me.
My uncle does hate the Genestella.
Excuse me...
Would you mind if I asked you something, too?
What is it?
What kind of training do you normally do, Amagiri?
Since I came to this school, I have been training on my own,
but I do have misgivings...
And besides, I cannot do any sparring by myself.
Then how about joining our training sessions?
Are you sure you would not mind?
Well, I should ask Julis about it,
but I bet she will be okay with it.
I am sorry...
I have been told not to be careless about tipping my hand...
and to keep my distance, especially with those ranked as Page Ones.
Gotcha.
Then will you join me during my early-morning training sessions?
Your sessions, Amagirii?
Training with me should not be a problem, right?
Y-You mean j-j-just the t-t-two of us, Amagiri?
Right.
So you do not have to worry.
Huh?
Is something wrong?
Oh, no...
Um...
Then I think I will take you up on your offer!
Saya?
Jeez, do not give me a heart attack!
Who was that just now?
Saya!
I cannot breathe!
Never mind, tell me!
Who was that just now?
I cannot answer you like this!
Sorry.
I had something on my mind, and did not realize how hard I was squeezing.
Oh, well, I guess it is all right...
What are you doing here, anyway, Saya?
I was looking for you.
Me?
About being my tag partner.
I want to hear your answer.
Sorry, but I am teaming up with Julis this time.
I cannot back down from that.
I see.
Gotcha.
By the way, who was that just now?
That was Ms. Toudou from the junior high.
The Rank 1 girl you were dueling with yesterday.
That is right.
Meaning that...
she is a first year in junior high with that body.
The world abounds with injustice.
Hey, come on.
Even so, she does resemble you in some ways, Saya.
Like how?
Well, apparently she came here to help out her dad.
Not that I have heard the details yet...
Father...
Ayato!
There is something I want to ask you.
Hey.
Are you having lunch now?
Want to sit with me?
Really?
Well, if you insist, I suppose I would not be averse...
Wait, that is not it!
What I wanted to hear about was Kirin Toudou and...
Spicy Curry Special
Are you sure?
It really looks insanely hot!
Did not I say it was not a big deal?
Anyway, let us talk about you and Kirin Toudou!
There is not much to talk about.
We have only been training together in the morning lately...
Hey, by any chance, are you still worried that I might give away my skills?
No, that is not what I am thinking.
Oh, never mind.
As long as you are acting like that, it should not be a problem.
By the way, you have not touched your curry at all.
If it is too much for you to handle, it is not too late to order something else.
Idiot!
As if I could be so wasteful!
H-Hey!
You really should not force yourself.
I am fine!
This is nothing!
Then listen, how about if I trade you mine?
Wh-What?
This is pretty hot, too, but I am sure it is not as bad as that one.
Oh, right, I guess you do not want something I have already eaten from.
N-No!
That is not the problem!
That does not really bother me at all.
It is just that...
N-No.
But it is my responsibility to consume what I have ordered.
I cannot very well hand it off to you.
But hey, we need to be able to talk about even trivial stuff like this,
or we will not work out as tag partners, am I right?
Well, that is...
Then, will you give me yours for this one?
Ayato?
Oh, sure!
Of course!
Thank you!
Get up, Ernesta.
They are on the move.
Nope, not sleeping - not sleeping.
I was just in deep thought with my eyes closed, okay?
Uh-huh.
Then why do not you tell me the reason why I came here?
The Tenorio guys are on the move, right?
Good thing we stirred them up, huh?
They have already gotten started.
You will miss them if you dawdle too long.
Right, right, copy that!
There is somebody else besides the swordsman kid?
Listen and be astounded.
That is Seidoukan's Rank 1.
And you are going to unleash this even with that knowledge?
Look how pumped up you are!
So?
Just how successful was your fishing expedition?
You did not manage to draw out the Magnum Opus, did you?
As if I would have any luck with that one.
I do not blame them for being cautious.
Well, who cares?
If they fail, it looks like we will be able to suppress the Tenorios for the foreseeable future!
But really, you do love to gamble.
You take too many risks.
It is more fun that way, so it cannot be helped!
It is pretty foggy today, huh?
Yes, it is...
Oh, but I hear that it can be even worse in the winter.
We might lose each other during this run.
Maybe we should hold hands!
All right, then...
M-My bad.
I was just, uh, kidding about that...
O-Oh, I-I am so sorry!
Under construction?
Amagiri...
It is not just one, right?
No...
But there is something strange about this.
Rather than human,
it feels more like...
They are kind of cute, are not they?
Amagiri, are you all right?
What are these?
Amagiri Shinmei-style, First Sword -
Four Wasps!
Do not tell me they are immortal or something...
Looks like it is not going to do much good to slash and thrust.
Would you mind if I tried something?
I am sorry.
It is over!
Just as I thought, there is some kind of core.
Good for you for figuring that out.
Because its Prana flow seemed off to me.
I have always been sensitive about that sort of thing.
I think I have glimpsed one aspect of your power, Toudou.
Synthetic.
Meaning that his is Allekant's work?
Hey, hold up, for crying out loud!
Amagiri!
Are you all right, Amagiri?
Yeah, you saved my life...
I am going to pull you up now!
Oh, Ayato!
So you do prefer large ones, after all?
Still, it never crossed my mind.
That Ms. Toudou would have such a vulnerability!
Episode 7 - Decisions and Duels
Perhaps I will invite her to come over sometime!
